wargame package¶

Submodules¶

wargame.abstractgameunit module¶

class wargame.abstractgameunit.AbstractGameUnit(name='')¶

Bases: abc.ABC

An abstract base class for creating various game characters

attack(enemy)¶

The main logic to determine injured unit and amount of injury

heal(heal_by=2, full_healing=True)¶

Heal the unit replenishing all the hit points

abstract info()¶

Information on the unit (MUST be overridden in subclasses)

reset_health_meter()¶

Reset the health_meter (assing default hit points)

show_health(bold=False, end='\n')¶

Show the remaining hit points of the player and the enemy

wargame.attackoftheorcs module¶

class wargame.attackoftheorcs.AttackOfTheOrcs¶

Bases: object

Main class to play Attack of The Orcs game

get_occupants()¶

Return a list of occupant types for all huts.

play()¶

Workhorse method to play the game.

Controls the high level logic to play the game. this is called from the main program to begin the game execution.

show_game_mission()¶

Print the game mission in the console

wargame.gameuniterror module¶

exception wargame.gameuniterror.GameUnitError(message='', code=0)¶

Bases: Exception

Custom exceptions class for the AbstractGameUnit and its subclasses

wargame.gameutils module¶

wargame.gameutils.print_bold(msg, end='\n')¶

Print a desired messsage in bold

wargame.gameutils.weighted_random_selection(obj1, obj2)¶

Randomly select between two objects based on assigned ‘weight’

wargame.hut module¶

class wargame.hut.Hut(number, occupant)¶

Bases: object

Class to create hut object(s) in the game Attack of the Orcs

acquired(new_occupant)¶

Update the occupant of this hut

get_occupant_type()¶

Return a string giving info on the hut occupant

wargame.knight module¶

class wargame.knight.Knight(name='Sir Foo')¶

Bases: abstractgameunit.AbstractGameUnit

Class that represents the game character ‘Knight’

The player instance in the game is aKnight instance. Other Knight instances are considered as ‘friends’ of the player and is indicated by the attribute self.unit_type.

acquire_hut(hut)¶

Fight the combat (command line) to acquire the hut

info()¶

Print basic information about this character

run_away()¶

Abandon the battle
